Ability.Name: --- healing spells ---
Ability.Lua: if UnitCastingInfo("player") == GetSpellInfo(605) then return true end

Ability.Name: Power Word: Fortitude
Shadow Protection
Renew
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 95 and UnitBuffID(PQR_CustomTarget, 139,"PLAYER") == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Power Word: Shield
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 100 and UnitDebuffID(PQR_CustomTarget,6788) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Inner Will
Shadowfiend
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") < 70 and GetSpellCooldown(34433) == 0 and UnitIsEnemy("player",PQR_CustomTarget.."target") and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil then CastSpellByID(34433,PQR_CustomTarget.."target") return true end

Ability.Name: Flash Heal
Ability.Lua: if ( PQR_CustomTargetHP < 85 or UnitBuffID("player",88688) ) and 100 * UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") > 30 and ( not PQR_IsMoving(1) or UnitBuffID("player",88688) ) then return true end

Ability.Name: Heal
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 85 and not PQR_IsMoving(1) then return true end

Ability.Name: Penance
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 85 and not PQR_IsMoving(1) then return true end

Ability.Name: Mass Dispel
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and not UnitChannelInfo("player") then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(32375))) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: Dispel Magic
Ability.Lua: if not DontDispel(PQR_CustomTarget) then local i = 1 local buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(PQR_CustomTarget, i) while buff do if bufftype == "Magic" and duration > 6 and count ~= 1 and UnitIsFriend("player",PQR_CustomTarget) then return true end i = i + 1; buff,_,_,count,bufftype,duration = UnitDebuff(PQR_CustomTarget, i) end end

Ability.Name: Pain Suppression
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 40 then return true end

Ability.Name: Desesperate Prayer
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 20 then return true end

Ability.Name: Inner Focus
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 60 and not PQR_IsMoving(1) then return true end

Ability.Name: Prayer of Mending
Ability.Lua: if havemending == nil and PQR_CustomTargetHP < 100 then return true end

Ability.Name: Binding Heal
Ability.Lua: if PQR_CustomTargetHP < 90 and 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 90 and not UnitIsUnit("player", PQR_CustomTarget) and not PQR_IsCastingSpell(32546) and not PQR_IsMoving(1) then return true end

Ability.Name: Arcane Torrent
--- offensive spells ---
Ability.Lua: if UnitIsDead("target") or ImmuneTarget("target") or not UnitCanAttack("player","target") or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 or ( not UnitAffectingCombat("target") and not SpecialAggro("target") and not UnitIsPlayer("target") ) or PQR_CustomTargetHP < 85 then return true end

Ability.Name: Holy Fire
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Shadow Word: Death
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") < 25 then return true end

Ability.Name: Smite
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Power Infusion
Ability.Lua: if not PQR_IsMoving(1) then return true end

Ability.Name: Mana Burn
Ability.Lua: if select(2,UnitPowerType("target")) == "MANA" and 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") > 40 and 100 * UnitPower("target") / UnitPowerMax("target") > 10 and UnitPowerMax("target") > 100000 then return true end

Ability.Name: Dispel Magic Offensive
Ability.Lua:
if not EnemyBuff then function EnemyBuff(t) local buff = { 43242, 92965, 93631, 76634, 88186, 76307, 31884, 2825, 32182, 80353, 1719, 17, 96802, 6940, 11426, 29166, 54428 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID(t,v) then return true end end end end
if EnemyBuff("target") then return true end

Ability.Name: Mind Control
Shadow Word: Pain
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") > 40 and not UnitDebuffID("target", 589,"PLAYER") then return true end

Ability.Name: Devouring Plague
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") > 40 and not UnitDebuffID("target", 2944,"PLAYER") then return true end

Ability.Name: Mind Spike
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") < 40 and not UnitDebuffID("target", 2944,"PLAYER") and not UnitDebuffID("target", 589,"PLAYER") then return true end

Ability.Name: Mind Blast
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") < 40 and ( select(4,UnitDebuffID("target",87178)) == 3 or ( select(4,UnitDebuffID("target",87178)) == 2 and PQR_IsCastingSpell(73510) ) ) then return true end

Ability.Name: Sheep Breaker
Ability.Lua: local possibleenemy = { "target", "focus", "arena1", "arena2", "arena3", "arena4", "arena5" } for _,v in ipairs(possibleenemy) do local spell,_,_,_,_,endtime = UnitCastingInfo(v) if spell == tostring(GetSpellInfo(118)) and endtime and endtime - GetTime()*1000 < 400 and PQR_IsOutOfSight(v) == false and not UnitBuffID("player",17) and not UnitBuffID("player",76669) and not UnitBuffID("player",47515) then SpellStopCasting() CastSpellByID(32379,v) end end

Ability.Name: USE: Trinket 1
Ability.Lua:
local _,cd,havecd = GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13)
if cd == 0 and havecd == 1 and 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") < 20 and UnitChannelInfo("player") == nil then UseInventoryItem(13) return true end

Ability.Name: --- initialize ---
Ability.Lua:
if not xeroninit then
function SpecialAggro(t) local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy", "Twisted Spirit", "AmaniÂ´shi Hatcher", "Hakkar's Chains", "Exposed Head of Magmaw", "Battleground Demolisher", "Ozumat", "Right Foot", "Left Foot", "Icy Tomb", "Risen Ghoul", "Mana Void", "Burning Tendons", "Wing Tentacle", "Arm Tentacle", "Twilight Assault Drake", "Goriona", "Ice Tomb", "Twilight Sapper", "Dreadlord Debilitator" } for _,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName(t) == v then return true end end end
function ImmuneTarget(t) local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 97417, 97977, 102915, 100686, 105784, 74938 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
function HoldCooldown(cd) if GetMinimapZoneText() == "Deathwing" and UnitName("target") ~= "Burning Tendons" and cd >= 1 then return true end if UnitName("target") == "Warlord Zon'ozz" and not UnitDebuffID("target",104031) and cd >= 3 then return true end if UnitName("boss1") == "Alysrazor" and not UnitDebuffID("boss1",99432) and cd >= 3 then return true end end
if UnitLevel("player") ~= 85 then print("\124cFFD12727WARNING: \124cFFFFFFFFLevel 85 is required to use this profile properly") end
if GetLocale() ~= "enUS" then print("\124cFFD12727WARNING: \124cFFFFFFFFenUS language pack is required to use this profile properly") end
print("Sheuron initialized, ver: \124cFFFFE6402012.02.08") xeroninit = true
end
if IsLeftAltKeyDown() or IsMounted() or SpellIsTargeting() or UnitBuffID("player",80169) or UnitBuffID("player",87959) or UnitChannelInfo("player") then return true end

Ability.Name: --- automatic target ---
Ability.Lua:
if not healinit then
function CalculateHP(t) local incomingheal = 0 if UnitGetIncomingHeals(t) then incomingheal = UnitGetIncomingHeals(t) end return 100 * ( UnitHealth(t) + incomingheal ) / UnitHealthMax(t) end
function SafeTarget(t) if IsSpellInRange(tostring(GetSpellInfo(2050)),t) == 1 and UnitIsCharmed(t) == nil and UnitIsDeadOrGhost(t) == nil and UnitCanCooperate("player",t) and PQR_IsOutOfSight(t) == false then return true end end
function DontDispel(t) local buff = { 96328, 96325, 96326, 86788, 30108 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
function DangerousMagic(t) local buff = { 5782, 118, 122, 339, 1499, 6358, 605, 20066, 8122, 853, 5484, 71757, 104601, 107629, 99567 } for _,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID(t,v) then return true end end end
healinit = true
end
lowhpmembers = 0 missingfortitude = false missingshadow = false havemending = false priodispel = nil if SafeTarget("target") then PQR_CustomTarget = "target" PQR_CustomTargetHP = CalculateHP("target") elseif SafeTarget("mouseover") and GetMouseFocus() ~= WorldFrame then PQR_CustomTarget = "mouseover" PQR_CustomTargetHP = CalculateHP("mouseover") else PQR_CustomTarget = "player" PQR_CustomTargetHP = CalculateHP("player") local group = "party" local members = GetNumPartyMembers() if GetNumRaidMembers() > 0 then group = "raid" members = GetNumRaidMembers() end
for i = 1, members, 1 do local member = group..tostring(i) local memberhp = CalculateHP(member) if SafeTarget(member) then if UnitBuffID(member,41635) then havemending = true end if not UnitBuffID(member,79107) then missingshadow = true end if not UnitBuffID(member,79105) and not UnitBuffID(member,90364) and not UnitBuffID(member,469) and not UnitBuffID(member,6307) then missingfortitude = true end if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" then memberhp = memberhp - 1 end if UnitThreatSituation(member) == 3 then memberhp = memberhp - 3 end if memberhp < 90 then lowhpmembers = lowhpmembers +1 end if memberhp < PQR_CustomTargetHP then PQR_CustomTarget = member PQR_CustomTargetHP = memberhp end if DangerousMagic(member) and not DontDispel(member) then priodispel = member end
end end
if SafeTarget("pet") and DangerousMagic("pet") and not DontDispel("pet") then priodispel = "pet" end if priodispel then PQR_CustomTarget = priodispel end
end
